20-001EC.summary: Recommendation to approve the minutes of the Ethics Commission Regular Meeting of Friday, November 22, 2019.Commissioner Shotwell spoke.Amy Webber, Deputy City Attorney, spoke.A motion was made by Vice Chair Morales, seconded by Commissioner Maniquis, to approve recommendation.  The motion carried by the following vote:Page 1 of 11411 W OCEAN BOULEVARD2ND FL CONFERENCE RM - THE BEACH, 2:30 PMWEDNESDAY, JANUARY 29, 2020CITY OF LONG BEACHETHICS COMMISSION MINUTESYes: 4 - Kimmy Maniquis, J. P. Shotwell, Margo Morales and Susan Wise2.
